description:
Tree Preservation Application At:
Canonbury House, Canonbury Place, Islington, London, N1 2NQ

TPO Reference:
T1 – Cherry of LBI TPO (NO.330) 2007
T4 – London Plane of LBI TPO (NO.330) 2007
T5 and T6 – Horse Chestnuts of LBI TPO (NO.330) 2007

PO Number:
T110439

Work specifications:

1 x Cherry (T1) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (No.330) 2007
Crown lift up to a maximum height of 5m above ground level
Crown thin by a maximum of 15% and remove deadwood
Remove x2 lowest branches
Crown reduce the branch growing over the road by up to 20% 

1 x London Plane (T4) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (No.330) 2007
Crown thin by a maximum of 15% and remove deadwood
Prune back branches encroaching on the adjacent properties by up to 20% to give up to 4m clearance
 
1x Horse Chestnut (T5) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (No.330) 2007
Crown reduce on the unbalanced side only by 20% 

1x Horse Chestnut (T6) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (No.330) 2007
Prune back branches encroaching on the adjacent properties by up to 20% to give up to 4m clearance
decision_conditions: Please contact the Tree Officer should you encounter Massaria in the London Plane tree.
